ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger creme de menthe liqueur
des: "A great replacement on the old story that a shot of ginger brandy will cure what ails ya. This is a smooth, cooling drink that you have to try before you comment on it. also known as Xmas in February."
ins: Fill an 8 fl. ounce rocks glass with crushed ice. Pour in the shot of creme de menthe and cherry juice, and stir. Toss in the cherry.
